Package depauw.edu.myro.android.sandbox

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BuildConfig  
    Camera_Simple
    This class enables the use of the Scribbler's camera along with the saving file potential of Android.
    DeviceListActivity
    This Activity appears as a dialog.
    DrawingView
    Creates a customized view that allows shapes to be drawn on a canvas.
    Graphic_Canvas
    Builds the canvas activity which uses the drawing view functionality.
    InfoActivity
    This class enables the use of the Scribbler's information to be sent to an Android device in the means of numbers; especially battery level being represented in the form of both an integer value and a picture.
    MainActivity  
    Movement_Accelerometer
    This class enables the use of the Scribbler's movement by utilizing An Android's Accelerometer.
    Movement_Controller  
    Movement_Explorer  
    Movement_Simple_Controller  
    Music_Beep
    Allows the user to play a tone of a specified frequency and duration using the scribbler robot.
    Music_Piano
    Builds a piano that will play notes using the scribbler robot.
    R  
    R.array  
    R.attr  
    R.drawable  
    R.id  
    R.layout  
    R.menu  
    R.string  
    R.style  
    Sandbox  
    Voice_Simple
